```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(reshape2)

devtools::load_all(".")

df = load_all_cqs() %>%
  fold_vs_gapdh()
```

```{r semplots, fig.width=4, fig.height=6}
# squash PCR replicates first
squashed = df %>%
  group_by(Target, Timepoint, Condition, Mouse) %>%
  summarize(FoldVsGapdh=mean(FoldVsGapdh))

for(time in unique(squashed$Timepoint)) {
  g = squashed %>%
    filter(Timepoint == time) %>%
    ggplot(aes(Condition, FoldVsGapdh)) +
      facet_grid(Target~Timepoint, scales="free") +
      stat_summary(fun.data=mean_se) +
      # ggtitle(time) +
      theme_bw()
  print(g)
}
```
